/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a vibrant contrast to the clear blue sky. Modern buildings rise in the background, their glass facades reflecting the sunlight and adding a touch of elegance to the urban landscape. Cars are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the busy life of the city. People can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
